casebody.data:
John M. BOWLING and Rayco Manufacturing, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. GREEN MANUFACTURING, INC., Defendant-Cross Appellant. No. 01-1194, 01-1211. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Dec. 19, 2001.

Before LOURIE, CLEVENGER and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R.36.
